data.title: Richmond Strikers to Host Inter Academy Camps this Summer
data.meta_description: The Richmond Strikers are thrilled to announce that they will be hosting Inter Academy Camps this summer at Striker Park.
data.text:
The Richmond Strikers are thrilled to announce that they will be hosting Inter Academy Camps this summer at Striker Park. These camps, presented by Inter, offer a unique opportunity for boys and girls aged U9-U16 to learn from coaches flown in from Italy who coach for current Serie A leaders and recent Italian Cup Champions, Inter Milan, and experience the world-renowned Inter training methods.

Day Camps

June 17-20th, 9am-2pm

June 24-27th, 9am-2pm

*Bring a lunch/snack

This camp will be open to boys and girls aged U9-U16. The cost for each session is $450. Each camper will receive two exclusive Inter Milan camp dri-fit shirts as part of their registration.

With a maximum limit of 250 participants, the Inter Academy Camps will ensure personalized attention and optimal development for each camper. The four coaches from Inter, along with Strikers travel staff, will lead a comprehensive program that combines technical skills training with tactical understanding.

Evening Camp

June 24-26th, 6:30pm-8pm

This camp will be open to boys and girls aged 9-15, as well as recreational players, and the cost is $150. Each camper will receive a high-quality dri-fit camp shirt as part of their registration. Spaces for the evening camp are limited, with a maximum capacity of 100 participants.

All camps will feature training sessions, games, drills, and methodology from Inter coaches and will award "Campers of the Week" for their outstanding performances, offering exciting prizes to those who excel.

Registration for the Inter Academy Camps is now open, and spots are filling up quickly. To secure a place for your child at this unforgettable soccer experience, you can log into PlayMetrics and register there OR you can register below!

CLICK HERE TO REGISTER
